# Changelog (ʘ‿ʘ)✧

All notable changes to the PyTrustStore project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [Unreleased]

### Added
- Initial project setup
- Core keystore functionality
- Certificate validation and verification
- CLI interface with colorful output
- Comprehensive documentation
- GitLab CI/CD pipeline for testing and PyPI publishing

## [0.1.0] - 2025-03-05

### Added
- Initial release
- Keystore loading and saving
- Certificate retrieval and listing
- Certificate parsing and information extraction
- Chain validation and verification
- Server certificate retrieval
- Certificate comparison and validation
- Descriptive alias generation
- Alias renaming and conflict resolution
- Click-based CLI
- Colorful output and progress indicators
- Commands: list, info, validate, import, rename, auto-rename
- Keytool and OpenSSL wrappers
- Result verification between Python and CLI tools
- Fallback mechanisms
- Comprehensive documentation
